title: Winter Classic Beats Records As NHL's Coldest Game
itunes:title: Winter Classic Beats Records As NHL's Coldest Game
description:
Scarlet Fu, Michael Barr and Mike Lynch discuss Antonio Brown's departure from the Tampa Bay Buccaneers, the upcoming SEC dominated College Football Playoff title game, and unbelievable temperatures from the NHL's Winter Classic.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
